sentence.Network_cn: 他的身体因营养不良而垮了.

sentence.Network_en: Forty per cent of children under five in developing countries are short for their age because of undernourishment.
sentence.Network_cn: 在发展中国家，5岁以下的孩子中有40%因为营养不良而身高偏低。

sentence.Network_en: What with overwork and what with undernourishment his brother became very ill.
sentence.Network_cn: 一方面因为工作过度,一方面因为营养不良,他哥哥病得很重.

PerfectNetExp.abs: consonant（清辅音），fricative和spirant（擦音），malnutrition和undernourishment（营养不良），toluene和methylbenzene（甲苯），gorse和furze（荆豆），glonoin.
2011年3月21日 -  营养不足(Undernourishment)意指摄取的卡路里低于最低热量需求(Minimum Dietary Energy Requirement, MDER);MDER是足以维持轻巧活动及起码体重及身高的热量.

list.abs: 专业词汇在线翻译、医学... ... 营养不良的 undernourished 低营养条件 undernourished condition 营养不良者 undernourished men.
Excellent for Tangs , baby fish , and undernourished fish bulk , Marine or Freshwater ., 适合海水或淡水鱼食用 , 尤其是幼鱼或者营养不良的鱼.
much research shows that children who are undernourished tend to suffer from learning difficulties and end up poorer .许多研究已表明，营养不良患儿容易遭受学习障碍，最后的下场就是更为穷困。
...transfer and use of technologies 转让和使用技术undernourished people 营养不良的人waterborne disease 水源的疾病
The number of undernourished people has increased against the backdrop of economic recession ., 在经济衰退的背景下 , 营养不良人口的数量已有所上升.

entry.def: If someone is suffering from undernourishment, they have poor health because they are not eating enough food or are eating the wrong kind of food.

example.ex: Forty per cent of children under five in developing countries are short for their age because of undernourishment.
example.tran: 在发展中国家，5岁以下的孩子中有40%因为营养不良而身高偏低。

means.word_mean: 1. not having enough food to develop or function formally

auth_sentence.content: UNICEF says undernourishment contributes to more than half of child deaths in the Sahel.
auth_sentence.res_content: UNICEF says undernourishment contributes to more than half of child deaths in the Sahel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: UNICEF says undernourishment contributes to more than half of child deaths in the Sahel.
